const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "amazon-bedrock-embeddings",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      content_embedding: {
        type: "dense_vector",
        dims: 1024,
        element_type: "float",
        similarity: "dot_product",
      },
      content: {
        type: "text",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
